name: Easy Tinned Tomato Sauce
description: A very quick tomato sauce for Neopolitan and NY-style pizzas. This is best for a quick week night meal.
ingredients: 1x 28oz Can of Crushed San Marzano Tomatoes
instructions: Add the italian seasoning and the salt directly into the can of crushed tomatoes and stir to combine
notes: Experiment with different brands of crushed tomatoes as each brand has a different idea of what crushed means
For an extra kick add some dried crushed red peppers.
